column4: ok i understand that perl is suppose to be installed already on ubuntu but when i execute a script on my server with a .pl extension it asks if i want to download and won't execute how do i get around this?

ok i understand that perl is suppose to be installed already on ubuntu but when i execute a script on my server with a .pl extension it asks if i want to download and won't execute how do i get around this?
